summary: What does a person when a suitcase full of dirty money literally falls on his head ? Give the money back, hand it over to the police or spend it as fast as possible ? Frits and Franky resolutely opt for the latter.
cast: Manou Kersting|Georgina Verbaan|Peter Van den Begin|Eva Laurenssen|Jack Wouterse|Axel Daeseleire|Peter Paul Muller|Sven De Ridder|Mathijs Scheepers|Reinhilde Decleir
keywords: ampersand in title|character name in title
title: Frits & Franky
